metadata.name: Limbo Deals 2
metadata.description:
This mod adds a third kind of deal room that can appear after boss fights: a Deal with the Old Gods. It won’t replace devil or angel deals - it appears when no other deal opens, or in rare cases alongside one of the other deals.
Items in these rooms are free, and you can take as many as you like. The catch is that the items in Limbo rooms come with both a positive and negative effect.
Taking items from deals with the old gods won’t affect your chances of getting deals with the devil or angel later in the run.
[SPOILERS] Full details on everything this mod adds: https://docs.google.com/document/d/12vBC9RxfrPelNG9QVQ3IkC_p-sK-lwhybS7lQ6H4UYU/edit?usp=sharing
